channel.title: Captain SIB on College Underground Radio
channel.description:
Welcome to the Captain SIB Show.
Clinically proven to cause slight quivering of the eye and mild narcolepsy.
Ingredients • 125g/4oz Confusion • 55g/2oz Depression • 180g/6oz Medication
Preparation method
1. Pre-heat the couch to a cosy warm feeling.
2. Beat the Confusion and the Depression together until smooth.
3. Stir in the Medication to get a smooth paste. Turn on to a work surface and gently roll out until the paste is 1cm/½in thick.
4. Cut into rounds or fingers and place onto a baking tray. Sprinkle with crushed Medication and chill in the fridge for 20 minutes.
5. Bake on the couch for 60 minutes, or until pale faced and unemployed.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give it a listen!
channel.itunes:author: Captain SIB on College Underground Radio

2. Beat the Confusion and the Depression together until smooth.
3. Stir in the Medication to get a smooth paste. Turn on to a work surface and gently roll out until the paste is 1cm/½in thick.
4. Cut into rounds or fingers and place onto a baking tray. Sprinkle with crushed Medication and chill in the fridge for 20 minutes.
